content: Grab the green Wisp and absorb it as you head up the final tunnel section of this cave, which will bring you at last to a large field of Snowhill Path. You can find some Gentian plants around here as you exit, and up ahead you can find the Frost-Clad Path Shrine.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path'.
The content is as follows:
Grab the green Wisp and absorb it as you head up the final tunnel section of this cave, which will bring you at last to a large field of Snowhill Path. You can find some Gentian plants around here as you exit, and up ahead you can find the Frost-Clad Path Shrine.
